Text:
WTF? why is it that every other [PublicHD] video gets stuck after playing for a few minutes and there is no way to watch the rest of the film?
Don't download [PublicHD]  It sucks.

Watching with VLC on a 2.4 quad core i7 17" MacBook Pro Mac OS 10.8 Mountain Lion.
Video only plays for 2 minutes and then gets stuck for the rest of the film, black screen, no audio too.
